content: skill level i think this is easy to crochet don t think about skill level try it materials i used nylon string 50g 7 wpi 3 25 mm crochet hook size nest = 7 5 inch long without tail start with working round after crocheting few rounds used row to make a hole from 7 to 11 if you do not like to crochet in back loop and front loop you can crochet it in the normal way too
